creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
markings: 2 lines of untranslated text, in black, on back
medium: Ink colors and gold on sized cotton
text: In the center of this ink painting is a winged blue god with barred fangs, spread wings, and six arms. He stands on a pedestal with flames radiating from behind him. Eleven similar deities with triangular blades are also surrounded in flame. At the bottom are four guardian deities while at the top are two sets of three monks on either side of a Buddhist mystic.
title: Thangka of Vajrakila and Diptachakra
